session_focus: Multi-file compilation system with import/export support
recent_accomplishments: Implemented complete module resolution system (module.rs - 328 lines)
Created multi-file compilation driver with topological sorting
Removed circular dependency restriction (aligned with JS/Rust design)
Created 2-file test example that compiles successfully

key_design_decisions.rationale: Domain of Discourse principle - mutually recursive algorithms arise naturally, language shouldn't prevent expression
key_design_decisions.influenced_by: David Herman's expertise designing JS and Rust module systems

key_design_decisions.rationale: Avoids lifetime issues with AST string references, ensures correctness over micro-optimization
Simpler codegen, works naturally with default exports, consistent pattern

next_steps: Phase 8: Type System Foundation (symbol table, scope analysis, basic type inference)
Future: Advanced prompt features (embedded do blocks)
Future: Historian example requires do blocks in prompts
collaboration_insights: Learned Domain of Discourse principle from David Herman
Distinguished implementation mechanisms from semantic restrictions
Questioned 'best practices' by understanding context and trade-offs
